front.title: Integrated Services Digital Network (ISDN) User Part (ISUP) to Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Mapping

abstract.t: This document describes a way to perform the mapping between twosignaling protocols: the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) and theISDN User Part (ISUP) of SS7. This mechanism might be implementedwhen using SIP in an environment where part of the call involvesinterworking with the Public Switched Telephone Network (PSTN).
